snippet.title: Just Cause 4: Panoramic trailer [4K UltraWide][ESRB]
snippet.description:
http://justcause.com/buy-now

Pre-order the Gold Edition of Just Cause 4 NOW! 

Dive into this insane 4K panoramic trailer and discover what’s awaiting you in Just Cause 4 this December. From gorgeous South American vistas, to memorable fights in extreme weather conditions, Just Cause 4 will push the limits of exploration and creativity in open world games.

Just Cause 4 is coming to Xbox One, PlayStation 4 and Windows PC on 4th December 2018.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Be sure to subscribe to our YouTube channel for further updates on Just Cause 4: http://sqex.link/JCSubscribe

https://JustCause.com
